title: Highest Multilateral Debt Service
description: In 2023, Afghanistan had the highest multilateral debt service, accounting for 100% of its public and publicly guaranteed debt service.

title: Lowest Water Productivity
description: In 2021, Afghanistan had the lowest water productivity, with a GDP of only $0.81 per cubic meter of total freshwater withdrawal.

title: Lowest Domestic Credit to Private Sector by Banks
description: In 2020, domestic credit to the private sector by banks in Afghanistan was only 2.99% of GDP, the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Inflation Rate
description: Afghanistan experienced a deflation of -6.60% in consumer prices in 2024, the lowest inflation rate globally.

title: Lowest CPIA Ratings
description: In 2023, Afghanistan had the lowest ratings in several CPIA categories, including economic management, fiscal policy, gender equality, macroeconomic management, and transparency, all rated at 1.

title: Lowest Logistics Performance Index
description: In 2022, Afghanistan had the lowest scores in the Logistics Performance Index, with an overall score of 1.9 and a score of 1.6 in tracking and tracing consignments.

title: Lowest Gender Parity in Education
description: In 2022, Afghanistan had the lowest gender parity index for youth literacy rates, with a value of 0.54.

title: Highest Proportion of Women Subjected to Violence
description: In 2015, 46.1% of ever-partnered women aged 15-49 in Afghanistan were subjected to physical and/or sexual violence, the highest proportion globally.

title: Lowest Antiretroviral Therapy Coverage
description: In 2022, only 9% of people living with HIV in Afghanistan received antiretroviral therapy, the lowest coverage worldwide.

title: Lowest Female Labor Force Participation
description: In 2024, the female labor force participation rate in Afghanistan was only 6.80% of the total labor force, the lowest globally.
